text: Yeroo Rabbiin jedhes [yaadadhu]:[] â€œYaa Iisaa! Ani si raffisaadhaGara kiyyattis ol si fuudhaadhaIsaan kafaran irraas si qulqulleessaadhaIsaan si hordofanis hanga Guyyaa Qiyaamatti warra kafaran irratti ol taasisaadhaErgasii deebiin keessan gara kiyya; waan isin isa keessatti wal dhabaa turtan keessattis gidduu keessanitti nan murteessa
